description: This delicious and easy-to-make Lotus Blossom Martini features unique ingredients such as pear vodka, Japanese sake, lychees, pear slices, and lime wedges, creating a unique combination that is not only exotic but also amazingly delicious.
name: Lotus Blossom Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Line the bottom of your cocktail shaker with the lychees, simple syrup, and your lime wedge. Shake gently to incorporate all flavors.
recipeInstructions.text: Line the bottom of your cocktail shaker with the lychees, simple syrup, and your lime wedge. Shake gently to incorporate all flavors.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the vodka and sake, then fill with ice. Shake vigorously until the outside of the cocktail shaker is frosted with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the contents into your cocktail glass.
